name: Beast Master and Prince
storyline:
This game follows Tiana, a young girl who dreams of following in her mother’s footsteps and becoming a famous animal tamer. However, she has one problem – she doesn’t actually own any animals! One day, after helping out at her friend’s bakery, she comes across a really shady seller at the local market whom is trying to sell these four random animals but has had no luck. Tiana falls in love with them and happily agrees to trade some jewellery her mother gave her for all of them.

When she gets home, she finds that her purchased animals are acting rather peculiarly and eventually they start speaking to her. As it turns out, the animals claim to be princes from a neighboring country whom survived an assassination attempt but ended up being transformed into animals. They ask for her help but is there really any way to turn an animal back into a human?
summary:
Tiana wants to be a great animal tamer like her mother, and on the day that she arrives to her new home in Cattleya, she comes across four animals that she buys along with a strange brooch.

But soon the animals start talking to her, telling her that they are actually four princes who were struck with a curse, and they need her help...
